languages.text: {n}Кибелла страдальчески хмурится.{/n} "Возможно, я могла бы служить Ему иначе... Я уже не узнаю этого. Ты отобрал это".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла страдальчески хмурится.{/n} "Неумирающий есть долг. Неумирающий есть смерть. Ты привел меня к Нему, но было ли мои выбором принять Его? Я хочу в это верить. Хочу верить... тебе".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah's brow furrows in anguish.{/n} "Perhaps I could have served Him differently... Now I will never know. You took that away from me."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла страдальчески хмурится.{/n} "Возможно, я могла бы служить Ему иначе... Я уже не узнаю этого. Ты отобрал это".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah frowns dolefully.{/n} "Maybe I could have served Him in a different way... I will never know now. You took that away from me."
{n}Kibellah frowns dolefully.{/n} "Maybe I could have served Him in a different way... I will never know now. You took that away from me."
{n}Kibellah's brow furrows in anguish.{/n} "Perhaps I could have served Him differently... Now I will never know. You took that away from me."
{n}Kibellah's brow furrows in anguish.{/n} "Perhaps I could have served Him differently... Now I will never know. You took that away from me."
{n}Kibellah's brow furrows in anguish.{/n} "Perhaps I could have served Him differently... Now I will never know. You took that away from me."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah fronce les sourcils d'un air accablé.{/n} « Fut un temps où j'aurais peut-être pu Le servir autrement... mais je ne le saurai jamais, à présent. Vous m'avez dépossédée du choix qui me revenait de droit. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's brow furrows in anguish.{/n} "Perhaps I could have served Him differently... Now I will never know. You took that away from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah fronce les sourcils d'un air accablé.{/n} « Fut un temps où j'aurais peut-être pu Le servir autrement... mais je ne le saurai jamais, à présent. Vous m'avez dépossédée du choix qui me revenait de droit. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah frunce el ceño, angustiada.{/n} «Tal vez podría haberle servido de otra manera... Ahora nunca lo sabré. Me ha arrebatado esa opción».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's brow furrows in anguish.{/n} "Perhaps I could have served Him differently... Now I will never know. You took that away from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah frunce el ceño, angustiada.{/n} «Tal vez podría haberle servido de otra manera... Ahora nunca lo sabré. Me ha arrebatado esa opción».

languages.text: {n}キベラは苦しそうに眉をひそめた。{/n}「もしかしたら、もっと違う形であの方に仕えていたかもしれない…今となっては知る由もないけど。あなたは我からそれを奪ったのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's brow furrows in anguish.{/n} "Perhaps I could have served Him differently... Now I will never know. You took that away from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは苦しそうに眉をひそめた。{/n}「もしかしたら、もっと違う形であの方に仕えていたかもしれない…今となっては知る由もないけど。あなたは我からそれを奪ったのです」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈痛苦地皱起了眉头。{/n}“或许我本可以通过其他方式来侍奉祂……可我再也不可能找到答案了，因为你把它从我身边夺走了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's brow furrows in anguish.{/n} "Perhaps I could have served Him differently... Now I will never know. You took that away from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈痛苦地皱起了眉头。{/n}“或许我本可以通过其他方式来侍奉祂……可我再也不可能找到答案了，因为你把它从我身边夺走了。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah runzelt gepeinigt die Stirn.{/n} "Vielleicht hätte ich ihm anders dienen können ... Ich werde es niemals erfahren. Das habt Ihr mir weggenommen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's brow furrows in anguish.{/n} "Perhaps I could have served Him differently... Now I will never know. You took that away from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah runzelt gepeinigt die Stirn.{/n} "Vielleicht hätte ich ihm anders dienen können ... Ich werde es niemals erfahren. Das habt Ihr mir weggenommen."
